thread.section_title: Hotel Arc de Triomphe Etoile - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel.
thread.title_full: Nice hotel. - Review of Hotel Arc de Triomphe Etoile, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Nickphi
title: Nice hotel.
text:
I stayed here for 4 days.
The room was a decent size for 1 person. But the single bed was a little bit disappointing. It was however very comfortable and the pillows and sheets very nice clean and comfortable.
The room is clean and the shower is great. Ideal after walking 15kms every day.
The front of house staff all spoke good English and very accommodating.
It is a little expensive but the location is hard to beat.
2 streets from Champ élysées and 2 mins to the Arc de Triomphe
Good spot.
